name: Lily

responses.Big Footprint: Bit too big for me friend, try %NPC maybe.
responses.Small Footprint: Looks like it could be mine! But %NPC is the same size as me.
responses.Glasses: Unfortunately yes, I do need glasses. %NPC is the only person with worse eyesight.
responses.Bag: Yes I do have a bag, but I think I left it in my car or something. That looks like %NPC's.
responses.Lipstick: I love a good lipstick. %NPC wears that colour more than me though.
responses.Right Handed: Yes I do normally use my right hand. So does %NPC.
responses.Dark Hair: My hair is a dark colour , it is a bit messy today though haha. %NPC has dark hair as well.
responses.Erotic Novel: Sorry, that sort of book isn't really my thing. Try %NPC.
responses.Broken Mobile Phone: Oh I'm sorry, I don't recognise it. Although, it could be %NPC's.
responses.Car Keys: I wish hahaha! I can't afford a car. %NPC has a nice car like that though.

noneResponses: Really sorry but I just don't have the time right now.
I'm sure it would be fine if I helped but just don't want to be involved right now.
I am not telling you, sorry.
